product_overview:
NCE Premier Platinum Plus


NCE’s Premier Platinum Plus Discount Medical Program is a great way for individuals and families to save money on out-of-pocket medical expenses, whether or not they have health insurance. Your savings start from the first dollar, with no limits. Our cost savings program gives employees/members access to the same pre-negotiated lowered rates similar to what insurance companies receive.

There are no:
• Deductibles
• Pre-existing condition limitations
• Medical exams
• Claim forms
• Limitation on usage
• Age restrictions
product_description:
NCE Premier Platinum Plus


Enrollment
$60.00 one-time 

Product
$69.95 per Month 

States Not Available: AK, CT, DE, MT, RI, UT, VT, WA

NCE’s Premier Platinum Plus Discount Medical Program is a great way for individuals and families to save money on out-of-pocket medical expenses, whether or not they have health insurance. Your savings start from the first dollar, with no limits. Our cost savings program gives employees/members access to the same pre-negotiated lowered rates similar to what insurance companies receive.
There are no:
• Deductibles
• Pre-existing condition limitations
• Medical exams
• Claim forms
• Limitation on usage
• Age restrictions

ValuePoint by MultiPlan®
Significant Cost Savings Nationwide
Choice – Broad access to more than 1,100 hospitals, 50,000 ancillary facilities and 425,000 practitioner locations.
Savings – Negotiated discounts that result in significant cost savings for you when you pay in full at the time of service. A ValuePoint logo on your program ID card tells both you and your provider that a discount applies, and your out-of-pocket costs are reduced by the discounted amount.
Quality – MultiPlan applies rigorous criteria when credentialing providers for participation in ValuePoint, so you can be assured you are choosing your healthcare provider from a high quality network.

Dentachoice by AccessOne DMPO
The Aetna Dental Access® Network
Advantages of this discount program:
  • No waiting periods and no age restrictions
  • No pre-existing condition exclusions
  • No benefit maximum
  • No paperwork hassles or claim forms to file
  • Cosmetic dentistry included
  • Orthodontia always included
  • Can be use in to enhance existing dental insurance
OUTLOOK Vision network
The OUTLOOK Vision network has contracted with over 10,000 eye care locations nationwide.
The OUTLOOK Vision provider panel includes ophthalmologists, optometrists, independent optical centers and national chain locations.

The vision program provides:
  • Savings of 10% to 50% on most prescription eyeglasses, frames, and lenses, through a national network of over 10,000 independent and chain vision optical centers.
  • Savings on contact lenses (excluding disposables) at participating retail locations.
  • 10% to 30% discounts on medical eye exams and surgical procedures, such as PRK and LASIK (where available and approved).
Pharmacy Benefit Card
Save an average of 55% on generic drugs and 15% on brand-name drugs at over 80% of pharmacies in the country.
Highlights:
  • Card is pre-activated and never expires. Use the card immediately.
  • Covers entire household, with no exclusions.
  • Personal information is never collected from the card user.
NCE Lifestyle Benefits 
Members have access to savings on everyday things in your life!Consumers are always looking to save money on things they do in their daily lives and throughout the year. That is why our Lifestyle Savings Program is a great way for people and their families to save hundreds and possibly thousands of dollars through the various categories of the Lifestyle Savings Program.
  • Hearing Savings
  • Medical Bill Negotiations
  • Medical Supplies & Equipment
  • Vitamins
  • Movie Tickets
  • Restaurants
  • Flowers
  • Travel
  • Vehicles
 Program is presented by the National Congress of Employers (NCE). Membership payments processed by Benefit Transact Solutions, LLC.

product_overview:
HMS plus ADB ($100,000)


HMS Plus with Accidental Benefit Rider is term life insurance with a $1,000 ‘all cause’ death benefit and a built-in Accidental Death Benefit Rider.

This product will not be allowed in the following states: Kansas, Mississippi, New York, Pennsylvania, and Vermont.
product_description:
HMS plus ADB


HMS Plus with Accidental Benefit Rider is term life insurance with a $1,000 ‘all cause’ death benefit and a built-in Accidental Death Benefit Rider.Accidental Death Benefit Coverage is available in the amount of $100,000, $200,000, $300,000 or $400,000. The sign state of a Telesales application is the state in which the owner/policyholder resides permanently.  Permanent residency cannot be determined by the owner/policyholder’s vacation home or other temporary residence. The state-specific application form used must match the sign state.

This product will not be allowed in the following states: Kansas, Mississippi, New York, Pennsylvania, and Vermont.

Please note: We do not allow any policy to be issued involving a New York resident (in either the Insured or Owner role).

States where additional disclosures are needed for existing insurance (25 TOTAL) If has an existing insurance policy, sales in these states are not allowed until further notice. Alaska, Arizona, Colorado, Connecticut, Hawaii, Iowa, Kentucky, Louisiana, Maryland, Maine, Montana, North Carolina, Nebraska, New Hampshire, New Jersey, New Mexico, Ohio, Oregon, Rhode Island, South Carolina, South Dakota, Virginia, Wisconsin, West Virginia, & Texas.  

Replacements of any kind will not be allowed with the TeleSales application process.  It is considered a replacement any time the Insured is considering canceling or discontinuing premium payments on an existing policy within the next 13 months, or, if they have canceled/discontinued paying premiums on a policy within the last 4 months.
The voice recording that is submitted to Americo will be the information that makes up the legal contract. Therefore, please keep in mind that all information pertaining to the contract for life insurance needs to be clearly stated and included on the call. Any discrepancies between the recording and the PDF will need to be verified (and possibly amended for) prior to issue of the policy.

Insured must be the one to answer all Personal History questions on the recording. These questions MUST be read exactly as they appear on the application.

If there is a separate Owner and or Payer on the policy, they MUST be on the recording as well to answer the appropriate disclosures. The Owner must verbally sign the application as well and the Payer must respond to NACHA disclosure.

The PDF you create will be included in the policy that the client receives, so please be mindful of proper spelling, capitalization, formatting etc.

You CANNOT refer to this product as an Accidental Death Benefit policy- must refer to it as a Term Life Insurance policy with an ADB Rider. When referencing amount applied for- must reference Rider amount since this policy has a $1,000 base face amount.

product_overview:
NCE Rx Card Benefits


NCE is proud to provide you with the NCE Prescription Drug Savings Program
The NCE Rx Discount Pharmacy Card:
  • Access to thousands of Brand Drugs, Generic Drugs and Over-the-Counter Medications

  • No Deductibles, No Annual Maximums, No Exclusions, No Pre-Existing Conditions

  • 31-Day Supplies on most prescriptions

  • Ability to purchase a 90-day supply of maintenance medications at retail locations

  • These benefits are discounts and not insurance
product_description:
NCE Rx Card Benefits

NCE is proud to provide you with the NCE Prescription Drug Savings Program

The NCE Rx Discount Pharmacy Card:
  • Access to thousands of Brand Drugs, Generic Drugs and Over-the-Counter Medications

  • No Deductibles, No Annual Maximums, No Exclusions, No Pre-Existing Conditions

  • 31-Day Supplies on most prescriptions

  • Ability to purchase a 90-day supply of maintenance medications at retail locations

  • These benefits are discounts and not insurance

The NCE Rx Card Pharmacy Network: 

The NCE uses a nationwide network with over 44,000 national chain stores (i.e. Wal-Mart™, Kmart™, Target™, Duane Reade™, CVS™, etc.) and independent pharmacies. To view an extensive listing of prescription drugs covered under your prescription discount drug card, your cost for these drugs, local providers who will provide these discounts for the covered drugs, click here.


Mail Order: 

Save even more with our mail order pharmacy services on both Generic and Brand Name drugs.
  • Generic: Up to 30%-80% Savings.

  • Brand Name: Up to 30%-80% Savings.
 
Access to Web Program and Tools:
  • Pharmacy Locator to help you quickly locate participating pharmacies in your area

  • Medication Pricing Tools and Generic Alternative Tools

  • Access to Frequently Asked Questions

  • The ability to Download Additional Membership Cards

Clinical Team: Members can speak directly with trained clinical professionals who can help identify effective and less costly prescription alternatives and work with your physicians and pharmacists to select these alternatives.

*Disclosures: These benefits are discounts and not insurance. 

The NCE Rx Card Prescription Drug Savings Program is NOT insurance. It entitles you to a discount on prescription medications at time of purchase at a participating pharmacy. You will still be responsible for paying the discounted cost for your prescription. The amount of the discount may also vary by participating pharmacy.

The NCE Rx Card Pharmacy Network: 

The NCE uses a nationwide network with over 44,000 national chain stores (i.e. Wal-Mart™, Kmart™, Target™, Duane Reade™, CVS™, etc.) and independent pharmacies. To view an extensive listing of prescription drugs covered under your prescription discount drug card, your cost for these drugs, local providers who will provide these discounts for the covered drugs, click here.


Mail Order: 

Save even more with our mail order pharmacy services on both Generic and Brand Name drugs.
  • Generic: Up to 30%-80% Savings.

  • Brand Name: Up to 30%-80% Savings.
 
Access to Web Program and Tools:
  • Pharmacy Locator to help you quickly locate participating pharmacies in your area

  • Medication Pricing Tools and Generic Alternative Tools

  • Access to Frequently Asked Questions

  • The ability to Download Additional Membership Cards

Clinical Team: Members can speak directly with trained clinical professionals who can help identify effective and less costly prescription alternatives and work with your physicians and pharmacists to select these alternatives.

*Disclosures: These benefits are discounts and not insurance. 

The NCE Rx Card Prescription Drug Savings Program is NOT insurance. It entitles you to a discount on prescription medications at time of purchase at a participating pharmacy. You will still be responsible for paying the discounted cost for your prescription. The amount of the discount may also vary by participating pharmacy.

product_overview:
FUSION: THE ULTIMATE CHOICE®

Combines dental and eye care benefits into one plan.

It’s simple! Dental and vision benefits are combined into one certificate, one enrollment form, and one premium. The annual maximum is combined into one amount. You choose how to spend your maximum.
product_description:
FUSION: THE ULTIMATE CHOICE®

Combines dental and eye care benefits into one plan.

It’s simple! Dental and vision benefits are combined into one certificate, one enrollment form, and one premium. The annual maximum is combined into one amount. You choose how to spend your maximum.

Individual plan features still apply — no more than the noted dental maximum can be applied to dental benefits, and no more than the noted vision maximum may be applied to vision benefits, with a ceiling of the FUSION maximum for both.

Dental and vision deductibles can be combined to reduce your out-of-pocket costs; the deductible may be satisfied with a combination of dental and vision services up to the individual plan limits, with a ceiling of the FUSION deductible.

Visit the providers of your choice! There are no network restrictions, but feel free to visit one of our money-saving PPO Dental Network providers.
